string-array.name: hugs
string-array.item: Yes you can. Don\'t ya ever don\'t ya ever give in ♡
Always always always make any self-judgement in daylight.\nWe are all a little worse for wear at night-time.
Hold on!!! You can get through this
My most loving, caring, squeezing, encouraging hugs to you my dear, you can do it ♡
Sending huge, enormous, irritatingly large hugs!
You\'re not a failure you\'re just going through a harsh time. Take care.xoxo
You win some, you lose some (: the only time you\'ll always fail is when you never try.
Remember to be compassionate to everyone, including yourself ♡
hold on,\nyou\'ve come so far!
\'Failure isn\'t fatal. Success isn\'t forever. What matters is the strength to get back up again\' :)
Glad you\'re here! :)
You deserve a life you enjoy, and I have faith that you will have it.
Sending you strength!
Sending you so much love and strength along with my biggest protective hugs.
Much love over to you, my dear, along with my biggest soothing hugs.
Sending huge protective hugs and hope you\'ll feel better soon ♡
*hugs* I hope you feel better
Stress-free hugs x
It doesn\'t have to be perfect, sometimes it just needs to be done.
You are brave ♡
Don\'t give up. It\'s just a bump in the road. :)
Small victories become big victories x
Keep going! Trying is the most important thing :)
You\'ve come a long way. Don\'t give up.
You don\'t have to try to be strong alone - is there anyone who you can talk to?
So many people love you even if you can\'t see it at this time.
Hope whatever your going through will improve soon! *Extra Big Comforting Hugs*
Hope you get better. Lots of love to you.
Lots of love and hugs xx
You can do this, you are stronger than you think and you have the skills to handle it!
You are special and there is no one who could ever replace you:)
Try to be as critical of your critical thoughts as they are of you
*GIGANTIC HUGS*
You can give up - but give up your pain, the thoughts and emotions that are hurting you.
Just keep moving forward, everything at some point just becomes a memory.
You can do it! ♡
Your feelings are valid ♡
We can all learn from our failures and move forward.
Nothing is as disastrous as we believe.
Don\'t ignore the light in times of darkness. It\'s there. You just can\'t reach it yet
You\'ll get through this :-)
You are perfect just with issues
You\'ll make it. I\'m sure. Crossing my fingers for you
Huge supportive hugs
It will get better again. Try to keep some hope xx
Sending loads of cuddly, comforting hugs.
I believe in you *hugs*
It\'s the small steps that bring you forward
Sometimes it can be refreshing to just let it all out. I hope you are okay x
You will get through this. Hold on xx
Just face a bit at a time, whatever you can handle.
Sometimes it\'s impossible to get through a day, but you can get through a minute...and minutes add up.
Your life is meant for a special unique human, who is no one else but you. And you are good enough for it, you are worth.
The future comes...you just get through the present.
Just focus on progress, not perfection
Don\'t let others ruin your accomplishments. They don\'t have that power over you.
Good luck! Get some rest, you\'ll be great.
You can do this! One step at a time x
